data.text: Do not hold the derailleur to try to straighten the assembly. If you want to try the repair yourself, removed the derailleur first. Personally, I would not try to align the hanger without some kind of alignment tool, except in an emergency. Alignment tools are not fancy or complicated, but they are long enough to give a better indication of how far the hanger is away from perfect. A hanger that is very slightly out of alignment can cause baffling shifting problems.
